title: Locke & Key, Vol. 1: Welcome to Lovecraft
description: Collects Locke & Key: Welcome to Lovecraft #1-6!The Eisner-nominated Locke & Key tells of Keyhouse, an unlikely New England mansion, with fantastic doors that transform all who dare to walk through them, and home to a hate-filled and relentless creature that will not rest until it forces open the most terrible door of them all!
author: Joe Hill
